description: Their on/off relationship almost completely derailed before Christmas. But lovebirds Tiffany Watson and Sam Thompson are clearly keen to put on a united front.
title: Made In Chelsea's Tiffany Watson and Sam Thompson enjoy the Maldives
title_page: Made In Chelsea's Tiffany Watson and Sam Thompson enjoy the Maldives | Daily Mail Online
text:
Their on/off relationship almost completely derailed before Christmas.
But, after reconciling with one another during Louiseâ€™s festive dinner party, lovebirds Tiffany Watson and Sam Thompson are clearly keen to put on a united front.
Which is exactly what they did as they holidayed at the Maldives' LUX* South Ari Atoll resort, this week.
Scroll down for video
Winter sun: Tiffany Watson and Sam Thompson are clearly keen to put on a united front - as they proved when they holidayed in the Maldives
The duo packed on the PDA as they strolled along the lavish white beaches and gazed into the blue waters, while Britain endures a cold snap.
Flaunting her figure in a white bikini with a baby blue lace trim, the blonde reality TV star was certainly feeling body-confident on her winter sun break.
Capping her look with a Sloaney pair of reflective sunglasses, she was clearly keen to look fashionable.
Likewise, Sam ensured he flashed his torso as he went shirtless along the shoreline.
Good times: The duo packed on the PDA as they strolled along the lavish white beaches and gazed into the blue waters at the Maldives' LUX* South Ari Atoll resort
Life's a beach! Flaunting her figure in a white bikini with a baby blue lace trim, the blonde reality TV star was certainly feeling body-confident on her winter sun break
Strutting his stuff in a pair of relaxed-fit swimshorts in navy blue, the handsome holidaymaker was later treated to a rub-down by his partner, who lathered him in suncream.
Seemingly enjoying the moment, he appeared both relaxed and romanced.
Not that it was all lazing around in the warm weather - instead they indulged in some friendly and refreshing watersports.
He's beach body-ready! Likewise, Sam ensured he flashed his torso as he went shirtless along the shoreline
Making a splash: Not that it was all lazing around in the warm weather - instead they indulged in some friendly and refreshing watersports
Riding a wave: Seen strapping on some bright red lifejackets, they were briefly joined by a local instructor who showed them how to jet-ski - before venturing out on their own
Seen strapping on some bright red lifejackets, they were briefly joined by a local instructor who showed them how to jet-ski.
Sam was first to lest the waters - quite literally - before him and Tiffany enjoyed a romantic jaunt into the skyline.
Having returned to their indulgent hotel, Tiffany took to Twitter to write: 'Far too relaxed. Can I just never return to England?'.
The wetter the better: Sam enjoys a power surf device, which projects users out of the water
Up, up and away! Sam experiences life-off as he's pushed into the air by the jet stream
Adrenaline rush: Sam clearly enjoyed his fun in the waves and wanted Tiffany to join in the fun
Enjoying herself: Having returned to their indulgent hotel, Tiffany took to Twitter to write: 'Far too relaxed. Can I just never return to England?'
